note.p: Burial: Cross Street Unitarian Chapel, Manchester, Lancashire

Career: Communicated to the Royal Chemistry Society on chemical subjects; assisted his father in practice, Manchester; published "Epitome of chemistry" (later entitled "The elements of experimental chemistry") (1801); Physician, Manchester Infirmary; gave up medical practice and devoted himself to his father's lucrative chemical business
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1836 No 27 pp 439-440
References: R W Jones, 'Dalton's unfortunate choice' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 15-33
